title: The Elders
descr: The Elders is an independent group of global leaders who work together for peace and human rights.

title: Africa Check
descr: Africa Check is a non-profit organisation which promotes accuracy in public debate.

title: Kofi Annan Foundation
descr: The Kofi Annan Foundation aims to promote better global governance and strengthen the capacities of people and countries to achieve a fairer, more secure world.

title: Marie Stopes International
descr: Marie Stopes place great emphasis on using evidence to continually monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of their health programmes.

title: National Housing Federation
descr: The National Housing Federation is the voice of affordable housing in England. We believe that everyone should have the home they need at a price they can afford.
